name: CurrencySpotVolatility
label: currency spot volatility
definition: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of past actual values for exchange rates

name: ExchangeRateVolatility
definition: statistical measure of the rate of change in the rate at which one currency can be exchanged for another
label: exchange rate volatility

name: ForeignExchangeService
definition: financial service involving the exchange of one currency for another, conversion of one currency for another, and transfer of money from one country to another whereby currency conversion is required
label: foreign exchange service

name: QuotedExchangeRate
explanatoryNote: An exchange rate of R represents a rate of R units of the quoted currency to 1 unit of the base currency.
label: quoted exchange rate
definition: exchange rate quoted at a specific point in time, for a given block amount of currency as quoted against another (base) currency

name: CurrencyForwardRateVolatility
label: currency forward rate volatility
definition: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of projected values for exchange rates

name: ExchangeRateStructure
label: exchange rate structure
definition: structured collection of quoted or projected exchange rates, such that volatility may be constructed for the structure

name: CurrencyForwardRate
label: currency forward rate
definition: rate of exchange between two currencies for settlement at some future point in time, expressed as a premium on the spot rate

name: InternationalElectronicFundsTransferService
label: international electronic funds transfer service
definition: electronic funds transfer (EFT) service involving the transfer of funds across national borders, that may also involve currency conversion

name: CurrencyConversionService
label: currency conversion service
explanatoryNote: A currency exchange service may be provided by a stand-alone business or may be part of the services offered by a bank or other financial institution. The currency exchange profits from its services either through adjusting the exchange rate or taking a commission.
definition: foreign exchange service involving the conversion of currency of one country or group of countries for another, typically, but not always, as a counter transaction

name: CurrencySpotMidRate
label: currency spot mid rate
definition: indicative middle market (mean of spot buying and selling) rate as observed by the reporting source

name: CurrencySpotRate
label: currency spot rate
definition: rate at which one currency may be exchanged for another for immediate delivery
explanatoryNote: Spot rates represent the prices buyers pay in one currency to purchase a second currency. Although the spot exchange rate is for delivery on the earliest value date, the standard settlement date for most spot transactions is two business days after the transaction date.

name: CurrencySpotSellRate
definition: indicative spot selling market rate as observed by the reporting source
label: currency spot sell rate

name: CurrencySpotBuyRate
label: currency spot buy rate
definition: indicative spot buying market rate as observed by the reporting source

name: hasQuoteCurrency
definition: indicates the quote currency in an exchange rate; R units of this currency represent one unit of the base currency
label: has quote currency

name: hasQuotedExchangeRate
label: has quoted exchange rate
definition: rate of exchange between two currencies as specified as of some date and time as quoted by a specific source

name: hasQuotationBlockAmountBasis
label: has quotation block amount basis
definition: indicates the amount of the dealt currency which would be exchanged in a trade for which the stated spot rate applies

name: hasExchangeRateQuotationSource
definition: indicates the origin of a quoted exchange rate
label: has exchange rate quotation source

name: isPremiumOn
definition: an exchange rate expressed as a premium on the spot rate for the currency pair
label: is premium on

name: hasQuotationSettlementBasis
definition: indicates the settlement period for a trade for which the stated spot rate applies
label: has quotation settlement basis
